product_desc:
Koachify is a sports-based, management and organization platform, providing coaches and teams with  technology based innovations to help streamline success.  Using a combination of tech savvy and deep personal experience in the world of sports, Koachify seeks to change the way coaches interact with their teams at the deepest fundamental levels. 

A full suite of tools surrounding connection and organization at the fingertips of players and coaches will allow their teams to function as efficiently off the field as they do on the field. By streamlining team communications and scheduling, Koachify will reduce the amount of time spent on menial tasks and improve team productivity. Koachify will also provide coaches with just the right amount of dashboard analytics to help them track their team and players progress; bringing that extra edge to an already analytically-oriented field
name: Koachify
